author: Giorgio Mendoza
description: Orange Pi closes the year by unveiling new details about the Orange Pi AI Station, a compact board-level edge computing platform built around the Ascend 310 series processor. The system targets high-density inference workloads with large memory options, NVMe storage support, and extensive I/O in a small footprint. The AI Station is powered by an […]
title: Orange Pi Unveils AI Station with Ascend 310 and 176 TOPS Compute
